# AudioOutputUnitStop(_:)

**Function**

Stops an I/O audio unit, which in turn stops the audio unit processing graph that it is connected to.

## Declaration

```swift
func AudioOutputUnitStop(_ ci: AudioUnit) -> OSStatus
```

## Parameters

- **ci**: The I/O audio unit to stop.

## Return Value

A result code.

## Starting and Stopping Output

- **AudioOutputUnitStart(_:)**: Starts an I/O audio unit, which in turn starts the audio unit processing graph that it is connected to.
- **AudioOutputUnitStartProc**
- **AudioOutputUnitStopProc**
